__TOC__

Every month the NY State Ubuntu Local Community in conjunction with <nowiki>[[http://www.interlockroc.org/|Interlock Rochester]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://lugor.org|LUGOR]]</nowiki> hold a four hour Linux hands on workshop. Area Linux and Ubuntu enthusiasts assist community members with installations and specific issues. These events often dovetail with the topics presented at Lugor so people can get hands-on experience with the information contained in Lugor presentations.
